name: Munchlax

evolution.description: Munchlax can evolve into Snorlax at level 8 and above if its loyalty level is +2 or higher. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 9 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Big Eater Pokémon. It wolfs down its weight in food once a day, swallowing food whole with almost no chewing.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.description: If an opponent uses a consumable held item in battle, this Pokémon gains a copy of it if it is not currently holding an item.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.description: This Pokemon takes half the damage it otherwise would from Ice and Fire damage.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: This Pokémon must eat its held berry when it falls below ½ of its maximum HP.
